titlestmt.titleproper: University of Arizona Agricultural Extension Service reports 1918-1958
University of Arizona Agricultural Extension Service reports
titlestmt.author: Processed by Staff.

profiledesc.creation: Inventory encoded in Oxygen XML editor by Steven Burg. March 25, 2016
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS (Describing Archives: A Content Standard).

change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: University of Arizona Agricultural Extension Service reports 1918-1958

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: University of Arizona. Agricultural Extension Service. County Agricultural Agents.

did.abstract: Bound typescript reports of County Agricultural Agents for each county, 1918 to 1958. Also includes photographs, charts, blueprints, clippings, and examples of publications. Includes statistical summaries for 1918-19 to 1932-33.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). The user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Arizona Board of Regents for the University of Arizona, its officers, employees, and agents from and against all claims made by any person asserting that he or she is an owner of copyright.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: University of Arizona Agricultural Extension Service reports (AZ 301). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Cooperative project of the University of Arizona, College of Agriculture and the U.S. Dept. of Agriculture to encourage agriculture and home economics in Arizona.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into chronologically by county within fiscal year.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Bound typescript reports of County Agricultural Agents for each county, 1918 to 1958. Also includes photographs, charts, blueprints, clippings, and examples of publications. Includes statistical summaries for 1918-19 to 1932-33.

relatedmaterial.p: Related collections at AZ 298, AZ 302 through AZ 309.
Continued by AZ 304 University of Arizona, Agricultural Extension Service, Combined reports of county, home, and 4-H Club agents, 1958-1968.
